text.tspan: Total confirmed deaths from COVID-19, by source, World
Confirmed COVID-19 deaths are compared for the three main data sources:
– European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)
Data source: Johns Hopkins University (2023); WHO COVID-2019 Situation Reports; ECDC (2020)
